alert.note: Alert for Maricopa; Pinal (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Dust Advisory issued November 03 at 12:09PM MST until November 03 at 1:15PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: The National Weather Service in Phoenix has issued a * Dust Advisory for... Maricopa County in south central Arizona... Pinal County in southeastern Arizona... * Until 115 PM MST. * At 1209 PM MST, a wall of dust was along a line extending from 8 miles north of Maricopa to Arizola, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Less than three miles visibility. SOURCE...Public reports . IMPACT...Hazardous travel. * This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 158 and 201. AZ Interstate 8 between mile markers 174 and 178. US Highway 60 between mile markers 175 and 179. Locations impacted include... Mesa, Chandler, Gilbert, Tempe, Casa Grande, Coolidge, Sun Lakes, Maricopa, Queen Creek, La Palma, Seville, Bapchule, Fiesta Mall, Olberg and Arizola. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Blowing dust brings reduced visibility, leading to dangerous driving conditions. If driving, avoid blowing dust if possible. If caught in dense blowing dust, pull off the road, turn off your lights and keep your foot off the brake.
